title: Infrastructure Bootstrap & DevOps Setup
acceptance_criteria: AWS infrastructure deployed with Amplify Gen 2 and CDK stacks for Auth, API, Data, Search, Media, Workflow, Observability, Comms, Admin
Security baseline including WAF, Shield, TLS, KMS, Secrets Manager, and IAM roles with least privilege
CI/CD pipelines with branch protections, security gates, and automated deployments to dev, stage, prod
Observability dashboards and alerts for latency, errors, cost, and security events live and monitored
Cost controls and budgets with alarms and auto-scaling configured
Staging and dev environments with ephemeral preview URLs and sandbox integrations
Runbooks for incident management, disaster recovery, and rollback procedures documented and tested

title: Core Data Models and Event Contracts
acceptance_criteria: Core data models implemented with strict constraints and cascading deletes
Event contracts defined with JSON schemas, versioning, and privacy tiers
Event ingestion pipeline established with Bronze, Silver, and Gold layers
Data quality tests and lineage tracking in place
Privacy compliance with PII masking, DSAR export and deletion workflows
Semantic layer and metrics catalog for KPIs implemented
CI gating on schema and contract changes enforced

title: Search & Indexing Implementation
acceptance_criteria: Search indices for People and Studios built with full schema and safe-mode filtering
GraphQL search API supports filters, cursor pagination, autocomplete, and role gating
Ranking algorithm implemented with fairness and promotions blending
Admin consoles for synonym editing, density caps, and invalid-click monitoring live
Caching and rate limiting enforced with telemetry dashboards and cost alarms
Search latency and availability meet SLOs
Tests cover relevance, safety, performance, and resilience

title: User Authentication and Onboarding
acceptance_criteria: Authentication supports email, Apple, Google, optional SMS, and MFA with security controls
Onboarding wizards for providers and hosts with step gating, autosave, and completeness scoring
Portfolio uploads enforce SFW media with moderation and cropping
Profile publishing gated by completeness and verification status
Public profiles show verified badges, SEO JSON-LD, and Safe-Mode filtering
Onboarding nudges and weekly digests implemented
Tests cover auth flows, onboarding steps, media upload, and SEO integration

title: Booking, Checkout, and Payment Processing
acceptance_criteria: Booking supports IB, RTB, Smart Invite with calendar and travel fee validations
Atomic LBG checkout with docs-before-pay enforced via Smart Docs e-signatures
Stripe Connect payments with card (3DS/SCA) and ACH integration with escrow and reserves
Refund kernel enforces time-banded cancellation/refund policies with admin overrides
Amendments, overtime, deposit claims, and disputes fully supported with audit trails
Admin finance consoles with dual approvals and reconciliation dashboards live
Tests cover booking flows, payment capture, refunds, disputes, and concurrency

title: Messaging and Collaboration System
acceptance_criteria: Messaging supports Inquiry and Project threads with role and booking context
Message requests gate new contacts with accept/decline/block and credit limits
Action Cards implement booking changes, extras, proofs, expenses, completion, disputes, and safety flags
File uploads scanned for virus and NSFW; safe-mode filtered previews enforced
Inbox supports folders, filters, search, pin/archive, and rate limits
Notifications via push, email, SMS, and in-app with quiet hours and user prefs
Admin moderation tools with immutable audit logs and dual approvals
Tests cover messaging flows, moderation, notifications, and concurrency

title: Smart Docs and Legal Document Management
acceptance_criteria: Smart Docs CMS supports versioned, role- and city-gated templates with typed variables
Docs-Before-Pay enforced with e-signature workflows blocking payment until all signatures complete
Immutable PDF storage with SHA-256 hashes and WORM retention for 7 years
E-sign adapter supports envelope lifecycle with webhook verification and idempotency
Admin consoles enable template management, audit logs, and dual approvals
Tests cover template versioning, e-sign flows, error handling, and performance

title: Trust & Safety and Verification Systems
acceptance_criteria: ID verification gating Instant Book and payouts with 18+ age enforcement
Background checks with FCRA compliance granting Trusted Pro badges
Social verification with OAuth integration and nightly sync
Studio verification with document upload, review, and badge issuance
Safe-Mode filtering and automoderation with escalating enforcement and strike system
Risk scoring and payout hold mechanisms implemented
Verification Center UI and admin consoles with dual approvals and immutable audit logs
Immutable evidence storage with legal holds and privacy protections
Tests cover verification flows, automoderation, risk scoring, and admin operations

title: Studio Marketplace and Booking Integration
acceptance_criteria: Studio listings with detailed amenities, pricing, availability, and deposit policies
Atomic booking holds with deposit authorization and blackout enforcement
Attach-in-flow linking studios to People profiles and Linked Booking Groups
Address privacy enforced with approximate location pre-booking and exact post-confirmation
Host dashboards with calendar, booking management, post-booking adjustments, and notifications
Studio search facets and SEO pages with Safe-Mode and NSFW scanning
Tests cover studio onboarding, booking, pricing, availability, and privacy

title: Reviews and Reputation System
acceptance_criteria: Verified booking enforcement for review submissions with double-blind process
Reputation Score computed with weighted factors, decay, and anti-gaming
Moderation tools with immutable audit logs and appeals workflow
Aggregated ratings and badges displayed on profiles and studios
Review filters and sorting integrated in search and public pages
Safe-Mode filtering of explicit content in reviews enforced
Notifications for review prompts and moderation outcomes implemented
Tests cover review submission, moderation, reputation calculation, and display

title: Portfolio, Boards, and Case Studies
acceptance_criteria: Portfolio supports media uploads with collaborator tagging and Safe-Mode filtering
Boards enable organizing and sharing mixed content with telemetry events
Case Studies provide SEO-friendly pages with 'Request Similar Shoot' RFP prefill
DMCA takedown workflows integrated with admin moderation and audit logs
Portfolio and boards integrated with search and public profiles
Tests cover media upload, tagging, board management, case studies, and takedown

title: FanSubscription Creator Features
acceptance_criteria: FanSubscription Creator role with enforced 18+ gating and Safe-Mode filtering
Subscription, paid requests, tips, and PPV content with escrowed payments
Media watermarking and immutable manifests for deliverables
Moderation and DMCA workflows tailored for FanSub content
Stripe Connect integration with tax calculations for FanSub payments
Creator dashboards and public pages with verified badges and safe previews
Notifications and analytics for FanSub activities implemented
Tests cover subscription flows, payments, moderation, and notifications

title: Help Center, Support & Disputes
acceptance_criteria: Help Center with categorized articles, markdown, search, and guided troubleshooters
Support Center with typed cases, evidence timelines, refunds, chargebacks, and DMCA
SES email bridge for inbound/outbound ticketing with DKIM/DMARC verification
SLAs enforced with timers, macros, and escalation workflows
Admin consoles with role-based access, immutable audit logs, and dual approvals
Notifications respecting quiet hours and user preferences
Observability dashboards and runbooks for support operations
Tests cover case workflows, email integration, SLAs, and admin controls

title: Promotions and Growth Features
acceptance_criteria: CPC Search Boost and Featured slots with eligibility, density caps, and city/role targeting
Quality Score ranking with bid and quality blending and auto-coaching nudges
Buyer RFP credits with fraud detection and monthly caps
Saved searches with alert frequency caps and weekly SFW city digests
Referral programs with device/IP fraud checks and clawbacks
Sharecards and link-in-bio microsites with Safe-Mode and attribution
Experimentation framework with CUPED, SRM guardrails, and preregistration
Tests cover promotions eligibility, fraud, alerts, referrals, and experiments

title: Communications and Notifications System
acceptance_criteria: Multi-channel communications with user preferences and quiet hours
Templated MJML documents with localization and A/B testing
Deduplication, batching, and suppression on bounces and complaints
Admin consoles for template and suppression management with audit logs
Link tracking respecting privacy and DNT
Deliverability with SPF, DKIM, DMARC, and warmup
Observability dashboards, alerts, and runbooks implemented
Tests cover routing, delivery, suppression, and compliance

title: Media Upload, Processing, and Delivery
acceptance_criteria: Chunked, resumable uploads with client-side crop and EXIF stripping
Immutable S3 storage with legal hold and lifecycle policies
Image/video processing with watermarking and adaptive renditions
Virus and NSFW scanning with quarantines and admin override
Proof galleries with watermarked, expiring media
Deliverables with licensed, non-watermarked assets and signed URLs
CDN integration with anti-hotlinking and caching
Cost controls with adaptive transcoding and deduplication
Tests cover upload flows, processing, scanning, and delivery

title: Availability, Calendar Sync, and Booking Feasibility
acceptance_criteria: Availability rules with weekly schedules, exceptions, and holds supporting time zones and DST
Read-only ICS calendar sync with polling and tokenized per-user feeds
Booking feasibility enforcing buffers, blackouts, lead times, and conflict detection
Atomic hold-to-confirm booking transitions integrated
Availability editor and calendar connect UI implemented
ICS attachments included in booking emails
Observability dashboards and alerts live
Tests cover availability logic, ICS sync, and booking feasibility

title: Admin Console and Operational Tooling
acceptance_criteria: Admin Console with strict RBAC, SSO, and JIT elevation
Modules for user, listing, trust & safety, finance, search, docs, content, and flags
Immutable audit logs with WORM storage and chain hashes
Dual approvals enforced for sensitive money and safety actions
Admin GraphQL API with role-based scopes and case-bound tokens
PII redaction and time-boxed access controls implemented
Operational dashboards, runbooks, and alerting integrated
Tests cover RBAC, audit, dual approvals, and admin workflows

title: SEO, Performance, and Accessibility
acceptance_criteria: Canonical URLs, robots.txt, segmented sitemaps, and hreflang implemented
Structured data JSON-LD for Person, Place, BreadcrumbList, FAQ, and Articles
Safe-Mode filtering on public pages and OG images enforced
ISR/SSR caching with CloudFront and edge invalidation configured
Core Web Vitals budgets met on mobile and desktop
WCAG 2.1/2.2 AA accessibility compliance verified
Localization with ICU MessageFormat, RTL support, and locale-aware formatting
Lighthouse CI integrated for continuous performance and accessibility testing
SEO and CWV observability dashboards live
Tests cover SEO correctness, accessibility, localization, and performance

title: Analytics, Experimentation, and Data Quality
acceptance_criteria: Event ingestion pipeline with schema validation and identity stitching
Attribution using click-token proof and channel grouping
Experimentation framework with CUPED, SRM guardrails, and preregistration
Data quality rules, lineage tracking, and DSAR compliance automated
BI dashboards for marketplace health, growth, trust, finance, and support
Cost controls with budgets, query limits, and rightsizing implemented
Security and privacy controls including PII masking and audit logs
Runbooks for data governance, incident management, and compliance
Tests cover data pipeline, experiments, quality, and privacy

title: Security, Privacy, and Compliance
acceptance_criteria: Least-privilege IAM and KMS encryption with secrets rotation
WAF with bot control, rate limiting, and abuse detection
Immutable audit logs with chain hashes and WORM storage
PII minimization, DSAR export/deletion, legal holds, and redaction
Quarterly pen tests, vulnerability scans, and security training
Incident response with severity levels, runbooks, and drills
PCI DSS compliance with Stripe Connect and no raw PAN storage
RBAC with just-in-time elevation and MFA enforced
Logging, monitoring, and alerting for security events
Tests cover security controls, privacy enforcement, and incident handling

title: Frontend Web and Mobile Applications
acceptance_criteria: Next.js PWA with SSR/ISR, service worker, and offline support
React Native apps with Expo sharing GraphQL APIs and auth
UI components for all major features with Safe-Mode filtering
Accessibility compliance WCAG 2.1/2.2 AA with keyboard and screen reader support
Localization with ICU MessageFormat, RTL support, and locale-aware formatting
Deep linking, push notifications with quiet hours, and background upload
Error handling, telemetry, and performance budgets enforced
Tests cover UI flows, accessibility, localization, and performance

title: Documentation and Runbooks
acceptance_criteria: Core documentation including architecture, ADRs, runbooks, access policies, test policies, risk logs, and code maps created and maintained
Per-agent prompt definitions documented in docs/agents/AGENT-*.md
Recurring meta-QA tasks for auditing run reports and queue quality established
Usage and cost tracking for LLM calls and CI runs implemented
Documentation version-controlled, accessible, and updated with feature development
Tests verify documentation completeness and update processes
